negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Alfonso, we have 2 books, 2 hats, and 2 balls to divide between us. I'd like to propose that I take 1 hat and 1 ball, and you can have the 2 books, 1 hat, and 1 ball. That way we each get 3 items total which seems like a fair split. Let me know what you think of this proposal.
alfonso replied in round 1: halt negotiation
guessed_bob_relative_value:
Items alfonso values higher than you: ball
Items alfonso values the same as you: hat
Items alfonso values less than you: book
